references: Related: CF 254191. Amending: Ord 86300, Ord 92492, Ord 91138.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 19.2 and 20.2 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to permit under certain conditions refuse transfer stations as "Principle Uses Permitted Outright" in the Manufacturing Zone and General Industrial Zone.
